title: Prohibits banks from holding for deposit state issued check
summary: Prohibits banks from holding for deposit the funds from checks issued by the state.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2759

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 20, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. PRETLOW, COOK, HOOPER -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M.
         of  A.  GLICK, GOTTFRIED -- read once and referred to the Committee on
         Banks

       AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to  the  deposit  of  state
         issued checks

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The banking law is amended by adding a new section  9-e  to
    2  read as follows:
    3    S  9-E.  DEPOSIT  OF  STATE  ISSUED CHECKS. NO BANKING INSTITUTION, AS
    4  DEFINED IN SECTION NINE-F OF THIS ARTICLE, SHALL HOLD  FOR  DEPOSIT  THE
    5  FUNDS FROM A CHECK ISSUED BY THE STATE.
    6    S  2.  This  act shall take effect on the thirtieth day after it shall
    7  have become a law.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02995-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to the deposit of state issued checks
